content.question: The colossal sculptures of the Buddha at Longman caves and Todai-ji depart from earlier aniconic traditions, which represented the Buddha with symbols like those used in

choices.label: the sculptural reliefs at Angkor Wat
the gates (toronas) at the Stupa at Sanchi
the carved exterior at Lakshmana Temple
the surface decoration of the David Vases

content.answer: the gates (toronas) at the Stupa at Sanchi
